57330.<voice 00490_00057330><start_lip_sync n0:

57331.<voice 00550_00057331><start_lip_sync n0:

57332.<voice 00635_00057332><start_lip_sync n0:

57333.<voice 00715_00057333><start_lip_sync n0:

57334.<voice 00745_00057334><start_lip_sync n0:

57335.<voice 00785_00057335><start_lip_sync n0:
The secret technique I will give you is the ''Heart of Hero''. This is the most secret technique of all, in which
the heart of courage possessed by a Hero is shared with a companion to draw out great power.

57336.<voice 00815_00057336><start_lip_sync n0:
To learn it, you will undergo the Trial of Spirit. The contents are quite simple. All you have to do is
fight the monster of the Trial and defeat it!

57337.<voice 00875_00057337><start_lip_sync n0:
Since is a Hero's ally, he must participate in the battle against the trial monsters together
with Anlucia.

57338.<voice 00910_00057338><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00910_00057338><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>We have a trial monster on the top
floor of Rinja Tower on Rinjahar Coast
in True Lendersia.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000236.<voice 00911_29000236><start_lip_sync n0:
Trial monsters use techniques to deceive the mind. If you are deceived, you will not be able to damage your
opponent. Be mindful of this.
